Job Title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test - Upgrade

The Quality Engineering Team is looking for an exceptionally talented software engineer who can understand the data platform and integration of multiple services/components end-to-end. Requirements        Contribute to engineering efforts for validating major/minor upgrades of the data platform.       Gather requirements from field and product team to replicate the customer environment and validate various upgrade paths.
